Sequence Information.Peptide Name: P. americana AMP (Pa-AMP-1; PAFP-S; Cys-rich; Plant defensin)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Bacillus megaterium (IC50=8 µg/ml), Staphyanococcus sp. (IC50=11 µg/ml).Fungi:Alternaria panax, Fusarium sp., Rhizoctonia solani.
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Structure Description: The global fold involves a cystine-knotted three-stranded antiparallel beta-sheet (residues 8-10, 23-27, 32-36), a flexible loop (residues 14-19), and four beta-reverse turns (residues 4-8, 11-14, 19-22, 28-32). This structure features all the characteristics of the knottin fold. It is the first structural model of an antifungal peptide that adopts a knottin-type structure.
Sequence Information.Domain: The presence of a 'disulfide through disulfide knot' structurally defines this protein as a knottin.

Literature.Title: Purification, characterization, and molecular cloning of the gene of a seed-specific antimicrobial protein from pokeweed.
Literature.Author: Liu Y, Luo J, Xu C, Ren F, Peng C, Wu G, Zhao J.

Literature.Title: Solution structure of PAFP-S a new knottin-type antifungal peptide from the seeds of Phytolacca americana.
Literature.Author: Gao GH, Liu W, Dai JX, Wang JF, Hu Z, Zhang Y, Wang DC.

Literature.Title: Solution structure of PAFP-S: a new knottin-type antifungal peptide from the seeds of Phytolacca americana.
Literature.Author: Hu Z.,Wang J.-F.,Dai J.-X.,Liu W.,Gao G.-H.
